ygData.subject: Re: Phobia
ygData.msgSnippet: Well the Iron fist is mobile so why can t the Cybertronian Fire? I figured give the grand old ship one more battle before it s demise, or return to cybertron

Well the Iron fist is mobile so why can't the Cybertronian Fire? 
I figured give the grand old ship one more battle before it's demise, 
or return to cybertron whichever you decide. It seems like to nice a 
ship to waste on a simple crash landing.

Phobia noticed Klusters look of doubt, the leader wasn't easily 
convinced of Phobias confidence. That could cause a problem in the 
future.

"You said the weapons on this magnificent piece of machinery. If you 
have working engines you'll have the maneuverability to out fly the 
Fist. you'll have the power to defeat the Predacons and save two 
worlds, isn't that why you're creator put you in this place at this 
time?

The spider was doing his best to bring Klusters confidence up. If 
this plan didn't work then he thought this planet and the history of 
Cybertron would both be doomed.

(Your call Yanosh@a)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> I think you missed a post, Cyberwolf, Kluster was helping Phobia 
drag the 
> crates.
> 
> ::Kluster::
> 
> Kluster turns his head at Phobia's little speach, raising an 
eyebrow.
> 
> "Lead the victory over the Iron Fist? I don't see how engines would 
help with 
> that, seeing how mobile bases are banned from this RPG..." he 
pushes the last 
> crate into the cargo hold, turning to Hysteria.
> 
> "Unfortunately, you're the techbot on this ship," he says, smiling 
good 
> naturaly at the word 'unfortunatey', "So you'll be best suited to 
check the 
> technology over. Make sure it doesn't have any bugs and stuff."
